# Great Mother
## Overview
Name: Great Mother

Gender: f

Rank: Greater Deity

Areas of Concern/Portfolio: Beholders, Fertility, Tyranny

Titles:

Holy Symbol: Egg with an eye

Alignment: CE

Origin of Worship: Beholder

Core Worshippers: Beholders

Common Worshippers:

Favored Weapon(s): Bite

Other Preferred Weapons:

Weapon of the Deity Spell: *+1 bite, keen*

Domains: Chaos, Death, Evil, Mysticism\* (CD), Protection, Strength, Summoner\* (CD), Tyranny\* (CW).
